GlusterFS In Brief

GlusterFS is a distributed file system capable of scaling to several petabytes (actually, 72 brontobytes!) and handling thousands of clients simultaneously.

GlusterFS combines blocks of storage over the network into a single, large storage pool that is served to client appliances. Gluster can deliver exceptional performance for diverse workloads.

GlusterFS is free and open source software enabling people like you to build data storage with high performance and great value, for a variety of demanding applications.

Performance Hilights

Why does Gluster perform so well? We could list a few success stories / references here and the reasons why they chose to use glusterfs.

We could then give a few examples of the kind of uses Gluster makes sense for and what kind of hardware is realistically required to achieve that.
